oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The revised EU Regulation: Impacts for the trade and Third Countries
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Huber, Beate
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents the most important facts about the new exporting rules under the revised EU regulation on organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Huber, Beate (2008) The revised EU Regulation: Impacts for the trade and Third Countries. Speech at: BioFach Congress 2008, Nuremberg, February 21-24, 2008.
